scenarios.title: No Quorum
scenarios.description: Only two of seven Directors are present at a special meeting to approve a major contract.
scenarios.question: What is the correct action?

options.C: Adjourn; reconvene when a quorum is present

scenarios.explanation: Board business generally requires a quorum.

scenarios.title: Unauthorized Signatory
scenarios.description: A program manager signs a multi‑year service contract without Board‑delegated authority.
scenarios.question: How should this be addressed?

options.C: Review per bylaws; require proper authorization for execution

scenarios.explanation: Contracts should be executed by authorized individuals per bylaws/Board resolution.

scenarios.title: Loan Request
scenarios.description: An Officer requests a short‑term personal loan from the Corporation.
scenarios.question: What do bylaws typically require?

options.B: Deny; loans to insiders are prohibited

scenarios.explanation: Loans to Directors/Officers are generally prohibited by bylaws.
